title: I need some assistance
body:
Okay, I am in need of assistance regarding to my gameplay. Can someone please add me (only if u have time) play a norm with me and tell me what I am doing wrong. I just got demoted from B2 to B3 so I am pretty sad about my lose streak, my mains are {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:131}} for mid lane, {{champion:412}} {{champion:89}} for supp, {{champion:236}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:29}} for adc and {{champion:106}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:254}} for jungle (don't have alot of experience with vi) {{champion:58}} {{champion:62}} for top. I would really appreciate help.
P.s: or you can comment some tips for me :)
Thank youuuu <3

replies.body:
I can add tomorrow not on computer at moment but first bit of advice I'll give you is you main too many champs going by that.  Narrow down your champ pool and have that one champ you know like the back of your hand and their limits. Zed is quite frequently banned so I'd almost forge about him for ranked and keep him for normals.

This season for ranked you only really need to know 2 roles so pick the 2 you're most comfortable with and forget the rest.

you have two champions at least for each role, that's great don't pay attention to the other guy.
Your champion pool is fine.

Try watching these, It could help.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI

People are in a similar position as you.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tkXYYRVI,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-06T08:58:59.050+0000)
>
> you have two champions at least for each role, that's great don't pay attention to the other guy.
> Your champion pool is fine.
> 
> Try watching these, It could help.
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI
> 
> People are in a similar position as you.

Thanks man, i really appreciate it.. btw I've known ur youtube channel for over 3 months now. (I'm a subscirber)

Oh shit lol.
I cant tell, as everyone has different names and stuff XD

I know Marauder has seen my stuff, but I cant tell if he subbed or not lol.

My point may have been misunderstood. But I don't see how you can main 15 champs across 4 roles. If he were to narrow it down a little he maybe able to have a greater understanding of the limits of his champs.
yeah I can see that, But two in each role is a good thing.

You are playing high risk high reward mids that are more or less the wrong choice for bronze players. First you should learn the game properly rather than trying to play champions that require knowledge and mechanics because if u had either of them you wouldn't be bronze. I suggest Annie for mid considering she is simple, easy to cs with and has good damage, playing her will allow you to learn the game rather than needing good mechanics aswell. 

If you want to clarify anything or ask for more specific help feel free to add me
IGN: CushCush
